title: Soundtrack Radio: EDM Music Pack
description: Powerful and engaging soundtracks of sporty and futuristic interaction, EDM pack is an elegant, yet energetic addition to the completion of your vision.
longDescription:
Soundtrack Radio is a collection of music tracks spanning various genres and concepts - ideal for any game, movie, advertising videos and other media. Powerful and engaging soundtracks of sporty and futuristic interaction, EDM pack is an elegant, yet energetic addition to the completion of your vision. This pack of music tracks sets up a perfect soundstage for victory, success and an engaging modern music experience with their intro, outro, looped and full versions. These tracks are packed in various resolutions, ensuring compatibility across a range of media platforms. Visual excitement meets the rhythm of life – EDM pack – feel the thrill of the race and ride the wave of electronic sound power!


This pack of royalty-free content includes; 

⦿ 11 x Music Track

⦿ 38 x Tracks including variations, intros and outros


Soundtrack Radio: EDM Music Pack is mostly used in various game genres requiring racing, sci-fi, action, energetic, electronic and futuristic touch.


This music pack includes these types of moods; 

⦿ Electronic

⦿ Energetic

⦿ Elegant

⦿ Futuristic

⦿ Powerful

⦿ Dance

⦿ EDM

⦿ Sci-Fi

⦿ Cyber

⦿ Party

⦿ Commercial


Total File Size: 1.79 GB

Format: 16bit, 44 kHz - 24bit, 48kHz

Number of Samples: 49 (for each sample rate/bit depth)

Available in 16bit, 44 kHz (game) and 24bit, 48kHz (video) versions 

Duration: 1:01:35 (hh,mm,ss)
